It's working
This one too
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'new-instance', templateUrl: './new-instance.component.html', styleUrls: ['./new-instance.component.scss'] }) export class NewInstanceComponent { @Input() buttonInfo : string; screenVisible : boolean = false; toggleScreen(e: any){ if(e == 'force-toggle'){ this.screenVisible = !this.screenVisible; return } if(this.screenVisible){ if(e.srcElement.className == 'overlay'){ this.screenVisible = !this.screenVisible; } } else{ this.screenVisible = !this.screenVisible; } } }
